scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --experimental-specifier-resolution=node -r dotenv/config src/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env.development
scripts.debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --inspect --experimental-specifier-resolution=node -r dotenv/config src/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env.development
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node -r dotenv/config src/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env.production
